name: BS Chrono Trigger Jet Bike Special
overview: Chrono Trigger is a game for the Super Famicom. From as early as May of 1995 it was discussed on the Satellaview broadcast magazine, Game Tora no Ooana. Later in the life of the Satellaview, downloadable content was released for Chrono Trigger via the Satellaview. These sets of download data included: Chrono Trigger Character Zukan Chrono Trigger Jet Bike Special Chrono Trigger Music Library
